amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit funding for intelligence activities at the level authorized in fiscal year 1998 and require a report on the efficacy of the Central Intelligence Agency including studies on the 1991 bombing during the Persian Gulf War of a weapons and nerve gas storage bunker in Khamisiyah, Iraq, and errors with respect to maps of Aviano, Italy in 1998 and Belgrade, Yugoslavia in 1999.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 and printed in the Congressional Record to limit total funding to the amount authorized for Fiscal Year 1999 and to require a report on the efficacy of the Central Intelligence Agency including studies on the 1991 bombing during the Persian Gulf War of a weapons and nerve gas storage bunker in Khamisiyah, Iraq and errors with respect to maps of Aviano, Italy in 1998 and Belgrade, Yugoslavia in 1999.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A007) as amended Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 343 (Roll no. 129).
